title: Death by Corporation
content:
Death by Corporation and the Death Star of the Trans Pacific Partnership, with Dr. Brian Moench  Dr. <!--more--> Brian Moench, MD is a board certified anesthesiologist in Salt Lake City, and the founder and president of the Utah Physicians for a Healthy Environment, a nonprofit advocacy organization opposing environmental degradation, the rise in toxic chemicals in the environment and warning of their serious health risks.  He is also a member of the Union of Concerned Scientists and has been on the faculty of Harvard Medical School.
  He received his medical degree from the University of Utah and completed a fellowship in intensive care medicine at Massachusetts General Hospital.
  Dr Moench has been writing on the corruption and psychopathology of multinational corporations and their grip on the planet’s food supply, land, air, water and our economy and wallets.  His series of important articles, “Death by Corporation” have been published at Truthout.org.
